message.content: {"given_definition_quality":85,"better_definition":"older brother","sentence":"哥哥在学校。","image_prompt":"A Chinese boy with a friendly smile, a little taller than other kids, wearing a school uniform with a backpack, standing in front of a simple school building under a cloudy sky. The scene is rendered in a soft apocalypse animation style, with gentle pastel colors and a touch of surrealism, but not scary or dark; the focus is on the brotherly figure, highlighting the concept of 'older brother' going to school.","sentence_translation":"Older brother is at school."}
